job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to enhancing and refining an AI system, which falls under the umbrella of model improvement and fine-tuning.

job_tasks.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'AI model fine-tuning sessions' clearly indicates involvement in the process of adapting and improving AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and testing new AI tools and methodologies directly involves working with and evaluating AI models and approaches.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support
job_tasks.justification: Integrating AI capabilities into a support system implies software development to make these integrations functional and user-facing.

soft_skills.phrase: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short
ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role
Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes improving AI systems, participating in AI model fine-tuning, and integrating AI capabilities. While there's some overlap with modeling, the core focus is on the application and refinement of generative AI for customer resolutions, aligning with the 'Language, Vision, and Interaction Specialist' definition.
